featured.text: And in 1994, Microsoft CEO (chief executive officer) Bill Gates paid $30.8 million for a handwritten notebook penned by Leonardo da Vinci.
In 1498, Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama made the first sea voyage to India, via the southernmost tip of Africa.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於表示某種情感或狀態的感嘆詞，通常用於強調或表達驚訝。
definition.en_def: An exclamation used to express a strong emotion or state, often used for emphasis or to convey surprise.
definition.example: Da! I can't believe you did that!
